name: First game Unity {Alpha 3.0.2}
description:
This is just my first game in Unity currently on version Alpha 3.0.2

It would be awesome if u could donate anything , but i dont even know how to set it up , so if there is an option , 1$ would help a lot , And btw did u like the game , comment down bellow if you liked the Alpha 

When you Download it , Extract Files and then Run the File -> Muck.exe
